level.heading: Acquisition of private facilities.
level.text: ยง 22-137 Acquisition of private facilities. In case any terminal facilities shall be provided, or agreed to be provided by the city as a substitute, in whole or in part, for any existing tracks, or other transportation or terminal facilities which the owner thereof may agree to surrender in consideration of the right to use such terminal facilities so provided in substitution, or agreed to be provided in substitution, the city may for such a time, and on such terms and conditions as may be agreed upon, lease, permit or agree in respect to such substituted use or operation.
